AN.name: Yoshi's Island™: Super Mario™ Advance 3
AN.description: Original Release Date: September 2002 When the evil Magikoopa Kamek tries to kidnap the infant Mario™ brothers, it's up to Yoshi™ and his pals to save the day! As Yoshi carries Baby Mario through enormous, colorful worlds, he'll have to throw eggs, gobble enemies, solve puzzles, and even transform into wild vehicles like a helicopter, a submarine, and a mole tank. Kamek's goons are constantly in pursuit, so stay alert and watch out for the Magikoopa's devious traps! Yoshi's in your hands! Enormous worlds and giant bosses that dwarf Yoshi and his young charge await in this rerelease from the Super NES™ classic! Watch that baby! Enemies are everywhere, and you'll have to become more than just a masterful egg-thrower to keep Baby Mario out of their clutches. Ground-Pound, Flutter-Jump, and morph your way to victory!

BZ.name: Yoshi's Island™: Super Mario™ Advance 3
BZ.description: Original Release Date: September 2002 When the evil Magikoopa Kamek tries to kidnap the infant Mario™ brothers, it's up to Yoshi™ and his pals to save the day! Enemies are everywhere, and you'll have to become more than just a masterful egg-thrower to keep Baby Mario out of their clutches. Ground-Pound, Flutter-Jump, and morph your way to victory!

BR.name: Yoshi's Island™: Super Mario™ Advance 3
BR.description: Data do lançamento original: setembro de 2002 Quando o malvado Magikoopa Kamek tenta raptar os pequenos irmãos Mario™, o Yoshi e seus companheiros têm que salvar o dia! Enquanto o Yoshi carrega o Baby Mario por enormes mundos coloridos, ele terá que jogar ovos, engolir inimigos, resolver puzzles, e até mesmo se transformar em veículos como helicópteros, submarinos e tanques. Os ajudantes do Kamek estão sempre a sua procura, então fique atento e de olho nas armadilhas do Magikoopa. O Yoshi está nas suas mãos! Mundos enormes e chefões gigantescos esperam pelo pequeno Yoshi e seus protegidos neste relançamento do clássico do Super NES™! Tome conta do bebê! Inimigos estão por toda parte, e você terá que se tornar mais que um bom jogador de ovos para manter o Baby Mario longe do poder deles. Use Ground-Pounds, Flutter-Jumps e abra o seu caminho para a vitória!

AE.name: Yoshi's Island™: Super Mario™ Advance 3

MX.name: Yoshi's Island™: Super Mario™ Advance 3
MX.description: Fecha de lanzamiento original: septiembre del 2002 Cuando el malvado Magikoopa Kamek trata de secuestrar a los hermanos Mario™, es la oportunidad perfecta para que Yoshi™ y sus amigos sean los héroes. Como Yoshi cargarás al bebé Mario a través de enormes y coloridos mundos. Yoshi tendrá que arrojar huevos, tragarse a enemigos, resolver puzles e incluso transformarse en vehículos tales como helicópteros, submarinos y tanques de guerra. ¡Los Kamek's goons están siempre al acecho así que mantente alerta y cuídate de las artimañas de los Magikoopa! ¡Yoshi está en tus manos! ¡Enormes mundos y gigantescos jefes que empequeñecen a Yoshi y a su joven carga esperan por ti, en el relanzamiento de este clásico de la consola Super Nintendo! ¡Cuida del bebé! Los enemigos están por doquiera por lo que tendrás que convertirte en un maestro en el arte de arrojar huevos para poder mantener al bebé Mario fuera de sus garras. ¡Ábrete camino hacia la victoria!

Los enemigos están por doquiera por lo que tendrás que convertirte en un maestro en el arte de arrojar huevos para poder mantener al bebé Mario fuera de sus garras. ¡Ábrete camino hacia la victoria!

NI.name: Yoshi's Island™: Super Mario™ Advance 3
NI.description: Original Release Date: September 2002 When the evil Magikoopa Kamek tries to kidnap the infant Mario™ brothers, it's up to Yoshi™ and his pals to save the day! As Yoshi carries Baby Mario through enormous, colorful worlds, he'll have to throw eggs, gobble enemies, solve puzzles, and even transform into wild vehicles like a helicopter, a submarine, and a mole tank. Kamek's goons are constantly in pursuit, so stay alert and watch out for the Magikoopa's devious traps! Yoshi's in your hands! Enormous worlds and giant bosses that dwarf Yoshi and his young charge await in this rerelease from the Super NES™ classic! Watch that baby! Enemies are everywhere, and you'll have to become more than just a masterful egg-thrower to keep Baby Mario out of their clutches. Ground-Pound, Flutter-Jump, and morph your way to victory!
